about_the_game:
A fast-paced, intense top-down bullet hell action experience with a unique sci-fi aesthetic. As a protector of light, you must build your power, reflexes, wits, and map knowledge as you slowly transform into an unstoppable force to survive through waves of void monsters and celestial demons.

  • Battle through relentless waves of enemies and survive as long as you can before the darkness consumes you.
  • Collect celestial energy shards in each run to unlock powerful upgrades and bolster your defenses for future encounters.
  • Equip a wide variety of weapons, each offering unique enhancement paths.
  • Strategize and discover the most effective combination for the mission ahead.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Relentless, High-Octane Survival Gameplay
  • Sci-Fi Aesthetic and Atmosphere
  • 4 Distinct Biomes
  • 30+ Weapons and Abilities
  • Dynamic Upgrade System
  • Endless Mode for True Survivors
  • Challenging Boss Encounters


About the Game

A fast-paced, intense top-down bullet hell action experience with a unique sci-fi aesthetic. As a protector of light, you must build your power, reflexes, wits, and map knowledge as you slowly transform into an unstoppable force to survive through waves of void monsters and celestial demons.

  • Battle through relentless waves of enemies and survive as long as you can before the darkness consumes you.
  • Collect celestial energy shards in each run to unlock powerful upgrades and bolster your defenses for future encounters.
  • Equip a wide variety of weapons, each offering unique enhancement paths.
  • Strategize and discover the most effective combination for the mission ahead.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Void Vanquishers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced, intense top-down bullet hell action experience with a sci-fi aesthetic. As a protector of light, you must build your arsenal of weapons, abilities, reflexes, and wits as you slowly transform into an unstoppable force to survive through waves of monsters and demons from the void.
